The dvd is Region Free

Tropic of Desire (1979)
Originally release on VHS during the early VHS Boom
It's first dvd debut was in October 2005 by VCX it's now out of print and a bit rare
VCX is one of those off-shoot distribution companies
I can bank this release runs circles around the previous dvd

Cast Include: Dorothy LeMay, Georgina Spelvin, Jesie St James, Sue Nero,Kitty Shayne, Star Hills, Mandy Ashley

The infamous World War II cathouse, The Pink Flamingo, is the setting for TROPIC OF DESIRE. Georgina Spelvin, the first lady of the adult cinema, plays Frances, the warm-hearted madam, who caters to the sex starved servicemen. Along with the explicit scenes as the troops roll in, are slices of genuine nostalgia, via the sets and period music. One of the more interesting concepts yet tackled. The stag film within the film is most unique.
Solid HQ adult film worthy of this re-release in 2K

Fantasy World (1979)
Originally release on VHS during the early VHS Boom
It too had a previous dvd release May 2004 also by VCX  this dvd is out of print not as rare as Tropic of Desire
I've never seen either one of these films before so I can't compare PQ to anything

Cast Include:Don Fernando, Jesie St James, Jesse Adams, Jon Martin, Laurien Dominique, Lisa Loring, Marlene Munroe, Michael Morrison, Paul Thomas, Sharon Kane, Starr Wood, Tyler Reynolds, Valerie Darlyn

THE SWEET SPELL OF SEX! Two trios, a group of guys and a group of gals, are out at night looking for fun. Both groups end up at a seedy nightclub where a magician/hypnotist directs a series of on-stage audience participation sex acts. This video features some of the most beautiful and sizzling women of the day on film!
